name: Undisclosed Distribution Channels
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Navia, equip this card.
After Navia equips this card, immediately use Ceremonial Crystalshot once.
After your Navia, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: Draw 2 Crystal Shrapnel cards. (Once per Round)
(You must have Navia in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1608]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1608] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S16082]</color> once.
After your $[A1608], who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: Draw 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116081]</color> cards. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1608] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Navia</color>, equip this card.
After Navia equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Ceremonial Crystalshot</color> once.
After your Navia, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: Draw 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Crystal Shrapnel</color> cards. (Once per Round)
(You must have Navia in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Navia to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
